channel.title: cognitive science on Ryan Stokes
channel.description: Recent content in cognitive science on Ryan Stokes

item.title: Motor Theory of Speech Perception
item.description: Abstract Recent evidence suggests that the motor system may have a facilitatory role in speech perception during noisy listening conditions.

item.title: Letter Position Encoding
item.description: Abstract Visual word recognition requires the identification of a wordâ€™s component letters as well as their position within a word.

item.title: Phonological and Attentional effects of the First Letter Advantage
item.description: Abstract For all readers, visual word recognition starts with the identification of individual letters within a word.

item.title: Child Risk Utility Measure (CRUM)
item.description: Abstract -- -- Children are notoriously fearless; running across slippery grass, eating bugs, and climbing up to the top of trees while their anxious parent yells at them to get down.
